TEI.2.document_title: John M. Bernhisel to Estate of Moses Austin, 10-06-1821

div1.p: The Estate of Moses Austin Dec
To Medicine and attendance from June 3d until 10th 1821__________$30. 50 To venesection and Pil Cathartic pro Mrs Austin__________________$ 1. 00
